phase1

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • phase1.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a Player that has a name, their current cash, the latest ActionCard drawn from the deck, a boolean value which determines if he is retired, and a CareerCard which consist of the details of his career

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(CareerCard career)
        Initializes the player object with the given career. The starting cash value is 20000.
        Parameters:
        career - career card picked by the player

      • Player

        public Player()
        Initializes the player object. The starting cash value is 20000. The default career given is a racecar driver.

        Parameters:

        public void setToRetire(boolean isRetired)
        Sets the retirement status of the player to true or false.
        Parameters:
        isRetired - true if the player is retired, false if not.

      • drawCard

        public void drawCard(Deck deck,
                     Player[] otherPlayers)
        Player draws a card from the action card deck and updates it changes based on the type of card. The player's total cash will be updated based on the type of card. Type will either be 1 (collect from the bank), 2 (pay the bank), 3 (Collect from the player), or 4 (pay player).
        Parameters:
        deck - chosen deck of cards
        otherPlayers - array of other players

      • nameValid

        private boolean nameValid(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if the user input is valid. The user input will only be valid if it contains at least one alphanumeric character and if the String doesn't contain all whitespaces.
        Parameters:
        name - name entered by the player.
        Returns:
        true if name is valid; false otherwise

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares two player objects and returns true if their name and amount of cash are equal, false if not.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        true if their name and amount of cash are equal, false if not.
